name: MR Smith
description:
Mr Smith's work is to collect coins,jewels and defeating all enemies. When he is scoring coins & jewels,his owner make them money and give to smith. Why smith is doing this?Is there is any villainous matters is the rest.  A casual and action game.

Tips-Make Full Screen For best Experience.Use Up,Down,Left,Right(buttons) and Space bar

                To contact:jhonmaternenon@gmail.com

Share To Everyone & Say your Opinion in Comments.
